doc.name: PeriodicTask
doc.description: A task that releases jobs with a given deadline and execution requirement periodically. The first job is released at time zero by default or at a start offset if one is specified.
doc.author: Christos Stergiou
doc.property: The relative deadline of the jobs released by the task.
The execution time required by each job released by the task.
The period with which the task releases new jobs.
The time instant that the task releases the first job.
